column4: i need help fixing grub. i used ubuntu tweak to remove what i thought was all the old grubs ;(
oh boy. What did you do and what do you now have?
i only have vista, the drive has win 8 and ubuntu 11
i tried the grub stuff from the links but i guess i messed up
no, what kernels do you have now?
oh, its 2.6.32-34 i think
i already baqckuped the stuff on the drive i needed
so, where is the issue?
the ubuntu lines arent there when grub starts, just memtest's and vista
boot to liveCD and chroot to the installed ubuntu OS and run:  sudo update-grub
perhaps if i hit e and change the vista line to load ubuntu, then use update grub n stuf that way?
if you are able to, why not :)
i did something similar a while ago and enede up reinstalling my entire hd im afaraid to do it agin
thats the exact page i used
